ERROR_STREAM_SERVER: Could not connect to stream server
HIGH_LATENCY_DOC: Enable this if you experience dropouts or buffering issues. Increases the network buffer to 32 MB (~48 seconds of Hi-Res audio) and adds a 2 second metadata delay. Recommended for WiFi connections, long-distance listening, or unstable internet.
HIGH_LATENCY_ENABLED: High Latency Mode enabled. Buffer increased to 32 MB. Restart playback for changes to take effect.
HIGH_LATENCY_DISABLED: High Latency Mode disabled. Buffer restored to normal. Restart playback for changes to take effect.
DELAY_DOC: Extra delay in milliseconds before displaying metadata. Use if metadata still appears before you hear the song change. Usually 0 is fine.
ABOUT_DESC: Mother Earth Radio Plugin v1.4 - Uses Server-Sent Events (SSE) for real-time metadata. No polling needed - the server pushes track changes instantly.
